hero.title:
Sonaraura is the sound of the universe,
re-engineered for branding.
hero.p1: Sonaraura transforms music from a mere background element into a living intelligence that manages the atmosphere of a space on biological and emotional levels.
hero.p2: By merging sound engineering, artificial intelligence, and psychoacoustics, we have built the world's first Atmospheric Intelligence platform. We are not an ordinary streaming service. We are a technology company that synchronizes the frequency of sound, the vibe of the environment, and the listener's pulse.

vision.title:
Architecture
Beyond Silence
vision.p1: Every space has a soul, every moment has a frequency. Our goal is to deepen the connection between businesses and creators with their target audiences through Frequency Engineering.
vision.p2: We evolve music from the standard 440Hz mold into 432Hz (Peace) and 528Hz (Focus/Vitality) frequencies, synchronized with human biology in real-time. While doing this, we maintain the musical rhythm (BPM), re-engineering art with scientific precision.

feature1.title: Molecular Sound
feature1.subtitle: Frequencies Engineered
feature1.desc: We don't just transmit sound; we process it. With our patented technology, we modify track frequencies in real-time to trigger desired emotional states (calm, energy, focus) in the listener.

feature2.title: Weather-Aware AI
feature2.subtitle: Atmospheric Sync
feature2.desc: Aura sees the world outside your space. When it rains, it makes smooth transitions to warmer, enveloping tones, and to energetic rhythms when the sun comes out.

feature3.title: Invisible Protection
feature3.subtitle: LSB Watermarking
feature3.desc: We embed a digital seal (UUID) into every sound wave we broadcast, imperceptible to the human ear. This provides signal-level protection against copyright issues across platforms.

feature4.title: Autonomous Music Director
feature4.subtitle: Smart Flow AI
feature4.desc: An AI that manages your space's energy curve from dawn until midnight. It ends the struggle of manual playlist management, optimizing your biorhythm 24/7.

footer.title: Sonaraura
footer.desc: The Architecture of Sound, the Frequency of Intelligence.

frequency.subtitle: Frequency Engineering
frequency.title: Molecular Sound Tech
frequency.desc: We don't just play music; we manipulate its physical structure. Seamlessly shift between 440Hz, 432Hz (Healing), and 528Hz (Focus) without losing a single beat. Sonaraura impacts listeners at a biological level.

karaoke.subtitle: Word-Level Precision
karaoke.title: Aura Karaoke Engine
karaoke.desc: Experience lyrics that breathe with the music. Our word-level synchronization engine highlights exactly what is being sung with elegant glows and scales, delivering a premium visual accompaniment.

weather.subtitle: Atmospheric Intelligence
weather.title: Weather-Aware Intelligence
weather.desc: Your venue's sound should reflect the world outside. Aura AI monitors live GPS and weather data to automatically optimize playlists and frequencies. When the rain starts, the atmosphere adapts instantly.

smartFlow.subtitle: Autonomous Director
smartFlow.title: Smart Flow Scheduling
smartFlow.desc: The 24-hour visual schedule manager. From calm morning flows to sophisticated evening atmospheres, Aura manages the energy of your venue autonomously, following its natural biorhythm.

enterprise.subtitle: Fleet Dominance
enterprise.title: Enterprise Hub HQ
enterprise.desc: Control thousands of venues from a single tactical interface. Monitor device health, sync status, and global scheduling with broadcast-grade precision across your entire enterprise.

studio.subtitle: Curation Mastery
studio.title: High-Fidelity Studio
studio.desc: The ultimate curation weapon. Use drag-and-drop precision and instant catalog discovery to design the perfect sonic narrative for your brand. Real-time sync ensures no venue is left behind.

waveforms.subtitle: Sonic Discovery
waveforms.title: Interactive Waveforms
waveforms.desc: Don't just listen, see the texture of the sound. Each track in our catalog features a live, interactive waveform that dances with the playback and allows for precision seeking.

intelligence.title: The Intelligence Layer
intelligence.desc: Autonomous systems that manage your content strategy and ROI while you sleep.

cta.title: Ready to soundtrack the future?
cta.desc: Experience the most technically advanced audio ecosystem ever built.

hero.title: SONARAURA
hero.desc: "The Architecture of Sound, the Frequency of Intelligence."

features.title: First and Only in the Industry
features.desc: Sonaraura offers an experience that affects the listener at a biological level and an unparalleled intelligence for businesses.

frequency.title: Frequency Engineering
frequency.desc: Switch to 432Hz (Peace) and 528Hz (Focus) modes in seconds without BPM distortion.

karaoke.title: Aura Karaoke Engine
karaoke.desc: Word-by-word synchronized lyrics. Words that glow and come alive with the music.

weather.title: Weather-Aware AI
weather.desc: Your venue's intelligence is synchronized with the outside world. Automatic optimization based on weather.

smartFlow.title: Smart Flow
smartFlow.desc: Autonomous Music Director. Aura handles transitions from calm mornings to sophisticated evenings.

enterprise.title: Enterprise HQ
enterprise.desc: Control thousands of branches from one center. Device health and instant synchronization.

studio.title: High-Fidelity Editor
studio.desc: Create perfect playlists with drag-and-drop precision and publish instantly.

signal.title: Signal Level Protection
signal.desc: We seal an inaudible digital UUID into the audio file (Steganography). Even if the file name or format changes (WAV → MP3), the ownership of the piece remains technically provable.

waveforms.title: Interactive Discovery Waveforms
waveforms.desc: Each track in the list has its own live "Time Wave". You don't just listen; you see the texture of the sound as you browse the list and can jump to any second via the wave.

analytics.title: Elite AI Analytics
analytics.desc: It analyzes not only listen counts, but also search terms, system delays, and production gaps. It transforms data into the answer to the question "Where should I invest?".

cta.title: The Soul of Your Venue, Your Voice.
cta.desc: Meet an autonomous sound factory with millisecond precision.

metadata.title: Enterprise | SonarAura
metadata.description: Scale your sonic identity across hundreds of locations.

Enterprise.title:
Soundtrack your

entire ecosystem.
Enterprise.description: One platform to manage music, licensing, and atmosphere across hundreds of locations. Scale your sound with centralized control.
Enterprise.controlDesc: Forget managing individual logins for every franchise. With SonarAura Enterprise, you control the sonic identity of 1,000+ locations from a single HQ dashboard.

mgmt.schedulingDesc: Push day-parted playlists to all zones instantly.
mgmt.permissionsDesc: Give local managers volume control, but keep curation locked.
mgmt.billingDesc: One monthly invoice for your entire fleet. No more expense reports.

infrastructure.title:
Unmatched

Infrastructure.
infrastructure.unlimitedDesc: Discover exclusive tracks by award-winning composers and up-and-coming artists, tailored for premium venues.
infrastructure.toolsDesc: Spend less time searching. Use 'Aura Tailor' for smart discovery and centralized playlist management.
infrastructure.publishDesc: Soundtrack your physical and digital spaces without restrictions. One simple license covers it all.

licensing.title:
Music licensing

made easy
licensing.p1: Forget lawsuits, surprise fees, copyright claims, and admin headaches. Our direct license model means you're cleared to use our music globally — regardless of media, territory, or type of content, both online and offline. Removing legal risk for your business.
licensing.p2: And because we own all the rights to our music, including public performance rights, we can customize our plans to cover all of your soundtracking needs, now and in the future.

cta.title: Ready to scale your sound?
cta.desc: Get a custom quote tailored to your number of locations and specific needs.
cta.agree: By requesting a quote, you agree to our <link>Terms of Service</link>.

of Ambience.
spaces.desc: Every space has a pulse. We provide the technology to measure, manage, and scale the perfect sonic environment for every single location.
spaces.missingDesc: We customize our technology for every environment. Let us design a solution for your specific venue.

subscribe.title:
Subscribe to our
latest news
subscribe.agree: By subscribing, you agree to our <link>Privacy policy</link>

s1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
s1.content: By accessing or using the Sonaraura platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations in the Republic of Turkey. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site.

s2.title: 2. Description of Service
s2.content: Sonaraura provides a proprietary "Atmospheric Intelligence" audio streaming and licensing platform. Services include B2B background music for commercial venues, B2C licensing for individual creators, and custom production services (Aura Tailor).

s3.title: 3. Intellectual Property Rights
s3.content: All audio assets, algorithms, branding, and "Sonic Taxonomy" data are the exclusive property of Sonaraura or its vetted production partners. Unauthorized reproduction, extraction (scraping), or re-distribution of audio signals is strictly prohibited and protected under the Law on Intellectual and Artistic Works (Law No. 5846).
s3.watermark: Sonaraura utilizes LSB Digital Watermarking. Every stream is embedded with a unique UUID that tracks ownership and prevents unauthorized usage across platforms like YouTube, Instagram, and Twitch.

b2b.title: B2B Subscriptions:
b2b.content: Grants a non-exclusive license for Public Performance within the specified venue. This license is compliant with local performance rights requirements for commercial spaces.

individual.title: Individual Licenses:
individual.content: Grants usage for digital content creation (YouTube, Social Media). These licenses are format-agnostic but restricted to a single project per license key.

s5.title: 5. Fees and Payments
s5.content: Fees are billed according to the selected plan. Payments are processed via secure gateways (Stripe/Iyzico). According to Regulation on Distance Contracts in Turkey, digital services that are executed immediately are generally non-refundable once the service (streaming or downloading) has commenced.

s6.title: 6. Termination
s6.content: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend access to our Service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms.

s7.title: 7. Governing Law
s7.content: These terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the Republic of Turkey, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Any dispute arising from these terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the Istanbul (Central) Courts and Enforcement Offices.

Privacy.title: Privacy & KVKK
Privacy.subtitle: Your data rights within the Sonaraura ecosystem.

s1.title: 1. Data Controller
s1.content: In accordance with the Law on Protection of Personal Data (KVKK) No. 6698, your personal data is processed by Sonaraura as the "Data Controller". We are committed to protecting the privacy and security of our users' information.

items.identity: Identity & Contact: Full name, email address, phone number (for corporate accounts).
items.account: Account Metadata: Avatar URL, subscription tier, tenant association.
items.usage: Usage Data: GPS location (for Weather-Aware features), playback history, search queries.
items.billing: Billing Data: Tax office, VKN/TCKN, official business address (processed via Stripe/Iyzico).

s3.title: 3. Purpose of Processing
s3.content: Your data is processed to provide a personalized "Digital Twin" experience, automate atmosphere management (Smart Flow), issue legal commercial licenses, and comply with tax regulations in the Republic of Turkey.

s4.title: 4. Data Transfer to Third Parties
s4.content: We transfer data to necessary service providers for infrastructure (AWS), payment processing (Stripe, Iyzico), and AI analysis (Google Gemini). All transfers are made under strict confidentiality agreements and in compliance with KVKK Article 8 and 9.

rights.title: Your Rights Under KVKK Article 11
rights.contact: To exercise these rights, please contact our Data Protection Officer at privacy@sonaraura.com.

s5.title: 5. Data Retention
s5.content: We retain your personal data only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy and to comply with our legal obligations (such as tax and commercial laws).

Cookies.title: Cookie Policy
Cookies.subtitle: How we use trackers to optimize your factory experience.

what.title: What are Cookies?
what.content: Cookies and similar technologies (local storage, telemetry trackers) are small data fragments stored on your device. In the Sonaraura ecosystem, these are not just trackers—they are sensors that help us align the "Digital Twin" of our factory with your real-world experience.

session.title: Session Intelligence
session.content: We use essential cookies via Supabase to keep you securely logged in. Without these, your Aura settings and personalized Smart Flow rules cannot be accessed.

telemetry.title: Playback Telemetry
telemetry.content: We track interaction data such as skip rates, listening duration, and frequency tuning preferences (432Hz vs 440Hz). This helps our AI refine your space's biorythm and improve the Smart Flow algorithm.

infra.title: Infrastructure Pulse
infra.content: We log search latency and CDN response times. These "performance sensors" tell our architects which global regions need more capacity, ensuring sub-millisecond audio delivery.

fraud.title: Fraud Prevention
fraud.content: Our payment partners (Stripe & Iyzico) use security cookies to detect anomalous behavior, protecting your B2B transactions and subscription integrity.

improve.title: Improving Your Experience
improve.content: The data collected through these technologies is strictly used for Product Evolution. We do not sell your personal behavior to third-party advertisers. Instead, we use it to:
improve.item2: Train our AI to predict your venue's peak energy hours more accurately.
improve.item3: Simplify the user interface by surfacing your most-used taxonomy tags.

venue.operational: The Sonaraura ecosystem is fully operational.
